api_list.name: resmush_get
api_list.description: Compress an image using GET method.

required_parameters.name: img
required_parameters.description: URL of the image to be compressed.

optional_parameters.name: qlty
optional_parameters.description: Quality level for JPG compression (0-100), default is 92.

optional_parameters.name: exif
optional_parameters.description: Whether to retain EXIF data, default is False.

api_list.code:
import requests

url = 'http://api.resmush.it/ws.php'
params = {'img': img, 'qlty': qlty}
if exif:
    params['exif'] = 'true'
response = requests.get(url, params=params)
print(response.json())

api_list.name: resmush_post
api_list.description: Compress an image using POST method by sending the file directly.

required_parameters.name: file_path
required_parameters.description: Path to the image file to be compressed.

optional_parameters.name: qlty
optional_parameters.description: Quality level for JPG compression (0-100), default is 92.

api_list.code:
import requests

url = 'http://api.resmush.it/?qlty=' + str(qlty)
with open(file_path, 'rb') as file:
    files = {'files': (file_path, file)}
    response = requests.post(url, files=files)
print(response.json())
